{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR1043ND |revision=v3.x |series=N450 |upc=845973051389 |asin=B002YLAUU8 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_date=06/11/2015 |fcc_id=TE7WR1043NDV3 |ic_id=8853A-WR1043ND |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FV |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2574BL-R;;3; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt,DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[0-9A-F]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|450Mbps Wireless N Gigabit Router}} {{startflatlist|indent=1}} * [http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_TL-WR1043ND.html Product page] * [http://www.tplink.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-WR1043ND&version=V3 Downloads] * [http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/TL-WR1043ND%28UN%293.0/Index.htm Firmware Interface] {{endflatlist}}
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr1043nd On '''OpenWrt''' wiki] The firmware differs from TL-WR1043ND v2.x in the addition in: :- IPv6 support :- Wireless Guest Network The hardware seems to be identical.
==Images== <gallery caption="from TP-LINK"> File:TL-WR1043ND-v3_01.jpg File:TL-WR1043ND-v3_02.jpg File:TL-WR1043ND-v3_03.jpg File:TL-WR1043ND-v3_04.jpg File:TL-WR1043ND-v3_05.jpg </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
